Data Fields

GTMessageDigest_st Struct Reference
[Common]

This structure represents hashed data. More...

#include <gt_base.h>

Data Fields

unsigned char * digest
size_t digest_length
int algorithm
void * context

Detailed Description

A GuardTime hash sum object, used as the seed to create a GTTimestamp and again when verifying that timestamp to create a GTVerificationInfo.

When calculating the hash sum of some data to verify a timestamp, make sure to use the same hash algorithm as when the timestamp was created.

Field Documentation

int GTMessageDigest_st::algorithm

The hash algorithm used to produce the digest. See GTHashAlgorithm for possible values.

void* GTMessageDigest_st::context

The context of hash computation. Only used while incremental hashing is in progress.

unsigned char* GTMessageDigest_st::digest

Data digest.

size_t GTMessageDigest_st::digest_length

Length of the digest.
